    • addTreasureToLevel

      public boolean addTreasureToLevel(String name, String url, int givSc, int numLvL, int times)
      Description: This method created and add one treasure to a level selected for the user and repeat it the time that he/she/they wants
      Parameters:
      name - String The name of the treasure
      url - String The URL that leads to the treasure image
      givSc - int The score the treasure gives the player
      numLvL - int It's the identifier f the level
      times - int It's the amount that a treasure is repeat on a level
      Returns:
      boolean. A boolean that shows if the treasure was added to the level or not
